subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=50|rad=巾|as=09|sn=12|four=|canj=LBOMN|ids=⿰[[巾]][[俞]]}}

# to [[cut]] a [[strip]] of [[cloth]]
# a [[breadth]] of [[material]]
# (same as [[繻]]) [[fine]] [[gauze]]
# [[fray]]ed [[edge]]s of [[silk]]
# silk [[torn]] into [[two]] [[piece]]s, one of which was [[give]]n as a [[credential]] and the other [[retain]]ed
# [[loose]] [[garment]] or [[cloak]]
# fine [[clothes]]
# [[leftover]] [[material]] after [[cut]]ting
# [[ragged]] [[fabric]]
